link.label: Cheat-sheet for a new Domain-Models project
link.text: This cheat-sheet guides through the steps required to create a new Domain-Models project as a container for Service Definitions, Communication Objects and other Tier 2 domain models.

link.label: Cheat-sheet for a new Component project
link.text: This cheat-sheet guides through the steps required to create a new Component project, which consists of a single component model with the focus on the component's internal details.

link.label: Cheat-sheet for a new System project
link.text: This cheat-sheet guides through the steps required to create a new System project, which allows the definition of a System Component Architecture, a Target Definition and a Deplyoment Model.
